text.content:
NURSING NOTE 
    1900 - 0700

    Has there been a FALL in the past 48 hours? 
         No
P: Infection
I: Antibiotics as prescribed, CBC as ordered
E: Remains febrile
PATIENT EDUCATION
   BARRIERS TO LEARNING
   Patient:  No observed barriers to learning 
   Comments: 
   Family/Significant Other: 
   Comments: 
   Information Taught:  oriented to unit, routine, call light

   To Whom: Patient
 
   Method:  verbal 
 
   Learner Response:  Indicates Understanding 
 
   Comments: 
IV ACCESS
   Peripheral IV 
     Size:20g
     Location:R hand 
     Date placed:May 30,2012


1900 - report from day shift RN.  Pt in bed, call light within reach.

1945 - assessment, pt education.

2100 - patient resting, awakened for meds

2200 - pt resting

2400 - IV meds, pt resting

0100 - pt resting

0600 - pt awakened for vitals and IVPB.

0700 - labs drawn, report to day shift RN.  No significant events overnight.
text.author: NURSE,TWENTY-NINE
